a type of cat with long, pale hair and a dark face, legs, and tail: Himalayans are medium to large cats with short bodies and brilliant blue eyes.Himalayan cat He shares the house with two prize exotic Himalayan cats, and has a wall covered with show ribbons. The big, fluffy Himalayan cat lies in the middle of the cluttered little living room.
